item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @hidendra Hidendra
item.description:
@hidendra wrote:

For talking NPC’s open NPCHandler, search for MOO. you should see…

if (npcs[i].npcType == 81 || npcs[i].npcType == 397 || npcs[i].npcType == 1766 || npcs[i].npcType == 1767 || npcs[i].npcType == 1768) { if (misc.random2(50) == 1) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "Moo"; } }

Under the final } put this:

if (npcs[i].npcType == NPCID) { if (misc.random2(50) == 1) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "TALKING NPC!"; } }
Just replace NPCID with the NPC’s ID, TALKING NPC! with what you want them to say.
If you want to do more, you see (misc.random2(50) == 1), you can change the 50 to like 1 so the text will stay there all the time, or 5, etc.
